title: After completion of procedure of rehabilitation of eligible slum dwellers in building, and conveyance of rehabilitation area to the Co-operative Housing Society of hutment dwellers, balance 10% of total Slum T
clause_text: After completion of procedure of rehabilitation of eligible slum dwellers in building, and conveyance of rehabilitation area to the Co-operative Housing Society of hutment dwellers, balance 10% of total Slum T.D.R. permissible shall be released.
section: Notwithstanding the provisions in clause mentioned above, if the developer does not desire to consume the full permissible in-situ F.S.I. on the same site, in such a case :

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
